error.title: Everything is OK
error.internal-desc: Reserved OK Value
error.desc: Everyting is OK

error.title: Cartridge formatting problem: Error
error.internal-desc: Failure during erase operation - Possibly bad cart
error.desc: 1. Check that your Mind Station has power, is connected to the computer, and that the cartridge is firmly inserted, and the green light is on. 2. Click the 'RETRY' button.

error.title: Cartridge formatting problem: Error
error.internal-desc: Failure during erase operation - Possibly bad cart
error.desc: 1. Check that your Mind Station has power, is connected to the computer, and that the cartridge is firmly inserted, and the green light is on. 2. Click the 'RETRY' button.

error.title: Cartridge formatting problem: Error
error.internal-desc: Failure during erase operation - Possibly bad cart
error.desc: 1. Check that your Mind Station has power, is connected to the computer, and that the cartridge is firmly inserted, and the green light is on. 2. If you are using batteries, try replacing them. 3. Click the 'RETRY' button.

error.title: Internet connection problem: Error
error.internal-desc: Lost connection to internet
error.desc: 1. Please connect to the internet. 2. If you are experiencing problems connecting, please contact your internet service provider. 3. Click the 'RETRY' button.

error.title: Cartridge cannot be identified: Error
error.internal-desc: Unable to identify the current flash. - possibly old lcf or bad flash.
error.desc: 1. Check that your Mind Station has power, is connected to the computer, the cartridge is firmly inserted, and the green light is on. 2. Click the 'RETRY' button.

error.title: Cartridge cannot be identified: Error
error.internal-desc: Unable to identify the current flash. - possibly old lcf or bad flash.
error.desc: 1. Check that your Mind Station has power, is connected to the computer, the cartridge is firmly inserted, and the green light is on. 2. Click the 'RETRY' button.

error.title: Cartridge cannot be identified: Error
error.internal-desc: Unable to identify the current flash. - possibly old lcf or bad flash.
error.desc: 1. Check that your Mind Station has power, is connected to the computer, the cartridge is firmly inserted, and the green light is on. 2. If you are using batteries, try replacing them. 3. Click the 'RETRY' button.

error.title: Mind Station software problem: Error
error.internal-desc: Files not found, files not parsable, files access wrong
error.desc: 1. Please reinstall using the installation CD provided.

error.title: Computer communication problem: Error
error.internal-desc: Unable to find any linker, or unable to find comnmand line requested linker. Can be no cart in 2001
error.desc: 1. Check that your Mind Station has power, is connected to the computer, and that the cartridge is firmly inserted, and the green light is on. 2. Check that the COM port that your Mind Station is connected to is not in use by another program. 3. Click the 'RETRY' button.

error.title: No internet connection detected: Error
error.internal-desc: Unable to initially connect to internet
error.desc: 1. Please connect to the internet. 2. If you are experiencing problems connecting, please contact your internet service provider. 3. For AOL users with children accounts, please log in to AOL as a regular account since downloads are restricted for Children Accounts. 4. Click the 'RETRY' button.

error.title: No website connection available: Error
error.internal-desc: Unable to initiate ACP connection
error.desc: 1. First check your internet connection. 2. If you are experiencing problems contact your internet service provider. 3. Click the 'RETRY' button.

error.title: Mind Station low power: Error
error.internal-desc: 2002 Linker Object reports low power condition.
error.desc: 1. For the most reliable power, please use the AC adapter and make sure it is firmly plugged in. You will know there's power if you see an indicator light illuminated on the Mind Station. 2. Click the 'RETRY' button.

error.title: No cartridge found: Error
error.internal-desc: 2002 Linker Object reports no cart present.
error.desc: 1. Check that your Mind Station has power, is connected to the computer, and that the cartridge is firmly inserted, and the green light is on. 2. Click the 'RETRY' button.

error.title: Cartridge removed early: Error
error.internal-desc: 2002 Linker Object reports that the Cart has been removed ( check after write fail )
error.desc: 1. Reinsert your cartridge. Your Mind Station progress bar that appears while downloading will tell you when it's okay to remove your cartridge. 2. Click the 'RETRY' button.

error.title: Mind Station connection was lost: Error
error.internal-desc: 2001 Linker Object reports that comunications have been lost to the Linker
error.desc: 1. Check that your Mind Station has power, is connected to the computer, the cartridge is firmly inserted, and the green light is on. 2. If you are using batteries, try replacing them. 3. Click the 'RETRY' button.

error.title: Mind Station connection was lost: Error
error.internal-desc: 2002USB Linker Object reports that comunications have been lost to the Linker
error.desc: 1. Check that your Mind Station has power, is connected to the computer, the cartridge is firmly inserted, and the green light is on. 2. Click the 'RETRY' button.

error.title: Mind Station connection was lost: Error
error.internal-desc: 2002COMM Linker Object reports that comunications have been lost to the Linker
error.desc: 1. Check that your Mind Station has power, is connected to the computer, and that the cartridge is firmly inserted, and the green light is on. 2. Click the 'RETRY' button.

error.title: Cartridge too small for download: Error
error.internal-desc: ACP has asked to write data to an invalid flash address.
error.desc: The inserted cartridge is too small for the download selected. 1. Please insert a larger cartridge or change your activity pack selection. 2. Click the 'RETRY' button.

error.title: Cartridge write problem: Error
error.internal-desc: Flash does not compare to original data correctly.
error.desc: 1. Check that your Mind Station has power, is connected to the computer, and that the cartridge is firmly inserted, and the green light is on. 2. Click the 'RETRY' button.

error.title: Cartridge cannot be read: Error
error.internal-desc: Cart can not be read
error.desc: 1. Check that your Mind Station has power, is connected to the computer, and that the cartridge is firmly inserted, and the green light is on. 2. Click the 'RETRY' button.

error.title: Mind Station software problem: Error
error.internal-desc: Download problem, corrupt lfs file
error.desc: 1. Please click the 'CANCEL' button and return to download starting at your page on MyLeapfrog. 2. If problem persists please reinstall your Mind Station software.

error.title: Mind Station software problem: Error
error.internal-desc: LBK is corrupt, developers only - until we do cacheing
error.desc: 1. If problem persists please reinstall your Mind Station software. 2. Click the 'RETRY' button.

error.title: Cartridge failed: Error
error.internal-desc: Cartridge has failed testing, suggest replacement
error.desc: 1. If problem persists please reinstall your Mind Station software. 2. Click the 'RETRY' button.

error.title: Failed initialization: Error
error.internal-desc: Run from command line without secret handshake
error.desc: 1. This program needs to be started by selecting either upload or download from your MyLeapfrog page. 2. If problem persists please reinstall your Mind Station software. 3. Please click the 'CANCEL' button and return to download starting at your page on MyLeapfrog.

error.title: Failed to use data file: Error
error.internal-desc: Developer use without specifying lbk name
error.desc: 1. If problem persists please reinstall your Mind Station software. 2. Click the 'RETRY' button.

error.title: Internal Error: Error
error.internal-desc: Catch all for development, not appropriate for product
error.desc: This is an internal Mind Station Error, Please make sure you have the most recent software by clicking below

error.title: Bad Port Speciifed: Error
error.internal-desc: The Application could not open a supplied comm port, comm ports are only used for hints so someone has installed something that has this port open after we sucessfully used it. This is not a real error, to be surfaced to the user but noteworthy nonetheless.
error.desc: Problem reusing old connection: This is an internal condition, specifiying that the specified comm port was not openable, this should only be an issue if we are looking using the hint, and other software are now using the comm port.

error.internal-desc: Internal 2001 serial error - Communications Negative Acknowledge
Communications Failure
Failed to ID cartridge, but Serial 2002 linker ok
Failed to ID cartridge, but USB linker ok
Failed to ID cartridge, but Serial 2001 linker ok

Failed to find file
Failed to control 2001 serial port properly
Failed to open comm, port, this is only a failure when linker is specified on command line
Timeout on wait for single object in engine thread creating greenleaf object
Internal Greenleaf error trying to control the baud rate
Internal Greenleaf error trying to control the flow control
Internal Greenleaf error trying to send a command

error.title: Application shutdown in progress: Error
error.internal-desc: Internally used to signal shutdown conditions

error.title: Cache was asked for a chunk that isn't cached.
error.internal-desc: Download cache was asked for a chunk that isn't in the cache.
